com.revature.controller

Class BatchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.controller.BatchController

  • @CrossOrigin
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="batch",
                produces="application/json")
public class BatchController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller containing all of the end-points related to the Batch class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private BatchService batchService
      Creates an instance of BatchService for retrieving data from the database.

      Sets up an end-point for retrieving a list of all batches with an employee with the provided first and last name.

      Sets up an end-point for retrieving a list of all batches associated with an employee with the provided ID.

      Sets up an end-point for retrieving a list of batches with the provided end date.

      Sets up an end-point for retrieving a list of batches with an end date between the provided dates.
